AppNexus (http://appnexus.com) - Sr. Software Engineer - Backend - Python/Django, SQL, MongoDB

San Francisco - Market St.

Apply here: http://appnexus.com/open-positions?jvi=oKzfZfwh

THE JOB: - Creating RESTful APIs that are fast, scalable, flexible, and extensible.

- Using mature open source technologies (such as Python, Django, Memchache, Solr, and others) to increase uptime and reduce latency.

- Developing an integration platform for combining data and coordinating multiple disparate 3rd party and in house system.

- Building a highly customizable analytics platform that can scale while remaining fast and intuitive to use.

- Creating systems that anticipate user actions and improve the more data and usage they experience.

THE YOU: - Bay Area based

- Familiarity with building RESTful APIs

- Experience with analytics, data warehousing or similar technologies

- Hands on knowledge of Python (or Java, C, C++ and interest in developing in Python) and SQL

- Background in analytics or data science is a plus.
